desc: Since 1989 gallery and publisher Klosterfelde Edition produces and distributes editions, multiples and publications by leading international artists. The online shop gives access to clients wishing to purchase an artwork of the gallery's current collection.

layout.text: Welcome to Klosterfelde Edition’s Online Shop

Browse through a selection of our prints, catalogues & edition boxes.
Enjoy shopping!

For a complete overview of our program, please visit www.klosterfeldeedition.de.
